summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3094, for the improvement of 13th Avenue Northwest, from West 83rd Street to West 85th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 37630 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
